title: Experience horrible
text:
Le cadre est sympa et les serveurs aussi mais la nourriture est vraiment horrible. Le service est hyper lent. Ils ont mis 1h √† nous servir un croque monsieur rassis, des frites surgel√©es froides et une assiette de lapin plus bananes plantains ( la pr√©sentation aurait √©tait mieux faite si c‚Äô√©tait fait maison, on aurait dit de la nourriture pour chien.) Je fais rarement √ßa mais c‚Äô√©tait ma premi√®re exp√©rience et j‚Äôai √©t√© extr√™mement d√©√ßue parce que je suis all√©e voir la g√©rante pour lui expliquer que √ßa n‚Äôallait pas et elle m‚Äôa r√©pondu que c‚Äô√©tait normal que ce soit froid parce qu‚Äôil y avait du vent. Elle ne s‚Äôest pas excus√©e et n‚Äôa m√™me pas trouv√© √ßa choquant. J‚Äô√©tais vraiment sur le c*l. 
M√™me en hiver on m‚Äôa d√©j√† servi des frites chaudes.

Bref tr√®s mauvaise exp√©rience, si vous y allez pour le cadre et pour un verre √ßa passe mais le service‚Ä¶ z√©ro point√© !
translated_text: The setting is nice and the waiters too but the food is really horrible. The service is super slow. It took them an hour to serve us a stale croque monsieur, cold frozen fries and a plate of rabbit plus plantains (the presentation would have been better if it was homemade, it looked like dog food.) I rarely do this but it was my first experience and I was extremely disappointed because I went to see the manager to explain that it wasn't right and she told me that it was normal that it was cold because it was windy. She didn't apologize and didn't even find it shocking. I was really shocked. Even in winter I've already been served hot fries. In short, a very bad experience, if you go there for the setting and for a drink it's okay but the service... zero points!

title: A perfect chill sunday
text: Very nice friendly place. The food is fresh and the kids enjoyed jumping in the lake üëç it s a perfect place for a Sunday chill!
translated_text: Very nice friendly place. The food is fresh and the kids enjoyed jumping in the lake üëç it s a perfect place for a Sunday chill!

title: CHILL
text: Lieu d√©couvert l‚Äôann√©e pass√©e, j‚Äôai ador√©e chill√©e ce premier jour de l‚Äôann√©e √† l‚Äôombre naturelle des palmiers, id√©al pour la d√©tente en famille o√π entre amis. Restauration simple mais efficace, jeux pour les enfants üëç
translated_text: Place discovered last year, I loved chilling out on this first day of the year in the natural shade of the palm trees, ideal for relaxing with family or friends. Simple but effective food, games for children üëç

title: Nice spot out of the city
text: To visit Bab's Dock you have to take a motor boat through a mangroves and then across a small lake. It's a nice place to go with the family for lunch, swimming and other activities for the kids. It's not cheap compared to other restaurants in Cotonou but it's not extreme. Worth a visit.
translated_title: Nice spot out of the city
translated_text: To visit Bab's Dock you have to take a motor boat through a mangroves and then across a small lake. It's a nice place to go with the family for lunch, swimming and other activities for the kids. It's not cheap compared to other restaurants in Cotonou but it's not extreme. Worth a visit.

title: Maltraitance animale
text: Les animaux sont en cage mais maltrait√©s ! Ils sont dans de petits enclos dans leur propre excr√©ment c‚Äôest de la maltraitance !
translated_text: The animals are caged but mistreated! They are in small enclosures in their own excrement, it's mistreatment!

title: Nice place near Cotonou
text:
Excellent place to visit near cotonou. Go by car for 15 min from City then 5 minutes 
Thrill speed boat ride to reach babs dock.
Kids can enjoy.
Vegetarian food is very limited.
Must visit place

title: Beau
text: Le cadre est beau et original, la vue est juste magnifique au bord de l‚Äôeau. Les animaux et tout, super.
translated_text: The setting is beautiful and original, the view is just magnificent at the water's edge. The animals and everything, great.

title: Great place to kick back and relax
text: Bab‚Äôs dock is a great place to kick back and relax. It‚Äôs great for group hang outs and very family friendly. The boat ride through the mangroves was a definite highlight of my trip. There are things to do if you love playing in the water but if you just want to kick back, enjoy the view and the cool breeze, that works as well. The staff were friendly and courteous and the food looked good but we didn‚Äôt have any which leads to the only downside for me. You need CASH!! I hardly carry cash cause I‚Äôm so used to paying for everything with cards so we had just enough to pay for the ride and a round of drinks. It‚Äôs a definite must visit for me but go with cash so you can access all the place has to offer.

title: Sympa
text:
Sympa pour passer un agr√©able moment pour d√©jeuner.
Quelques animaux sont visibles.
Possibilit√© de se baigner
translated_text: Nice place to spend a pleasant lunch. Some animals are visible. Possibility of swimming.

title: Beau mais animaux en cage mal conserv√©s !!
text: L‚Äôendroit est magnifique mais singes et crocodile en cages sont pas contents et mal entretenus. Il faut respecter les animaux!
translated_title: Beautiful but poorly preserved caged animals!!
translated_text: The place is beautiful, but the monkeys and crocodiles in cages are unhappy and poorly maintained. We must respect the animals!

title: What a vacation should feel like
text:
Wonderful experience boat ride to a private little island , the tree tunnel was outstanding to ride through before you arrive to the dock. Nice breezy island family friendly couples also Food and sevice was excellent . Zoo was cute , boat rides swimming in the lake Wow just worth it all .most of all so so peaceful like a vacation out of Africa.
Thanks for a American experience in a
African World. B.Anderson

title: Coin de paradis
text:
J‚Äôai atterris √† Bab‚Äôs dock sur recommendation d‚Äôun ami.
C‚Äôest ma Meilleure d√©couverte √† Cotonou.
On arrive sur les lieux en prenant une barque qui traverse la mangrove. C‚Äôest magnifique et enchanteur.
Sur place le cadre est magique, la lagune, les animaux (√¢nes, tortues, alligators, singes) raviront les enfants.
On vient l√† pour se d√©tendre et profiter du calme loin de l‚Äôagitation de Cotonou.. mais pour les hyperactifs possibilit√© de faire du cano√´, de la voile ou une promenade sur la lagune.
Ahh aussi leurs cocktails sont succulents!
translated_text: I landed at Bab's Dock on the recommendation of a friend. It's my best discovery in Cotonou. You arrive there by taking a boat that crosses the mangrove. It's magnificent and enchanting. The setting there is magical, the lagoon, the animals (donkeys, turtles, alligators, monkeys) will delight the children. We come there to relax and enjoy the peace and quiet far from the hustle and bustle of Cotonou... but for the hyperactive, there is the possibility of canoeing, sailing or a walk on the lagoon. Ahh also their cocktails are delicious!

title: Belle balade √† la Route des P√™ches
text: Ce lieu montre un tr√®s beau paysage de littoral qui se laisse d√©vor√© des yeux, tr√®s accueillant avec un calme sain
translated_title: Beautiful walk on the Fishing Route
translated_text: This place shows a very beautiful coastal landscape that is devoured by the eyes, very welcoming with a healthy calm

title: Sensation unique
text: C'est la premi√®re fois que je suis all√© dans cette attraction et je peux dire que c'est le kif d√©mentiel. Des maison sur pilotis, des barques avec voiles improvis√©es
translated_text: This is the first time I've been to this attraction and I can say it's a blast. Houses on stilts, boats with improvised sails.

title: A place to relax
text: It is a beautiful and relaxing place to eat, drink or swim in the lake. The landscape is very authentic, the trip by boat through mangroves is something to remember, there I a mini zoo and also some rooms to let. It is a peaceful place and totally different from the noisy and busy roads of Cotonou
translated_text: It is a beautiful and relaxing place to eat, drink or swim in the lake. The landscape is very authentic, the trip by boat through mangroves is something to remember, there I a mini zoo and also some rooms to let. It is a peaceful place and totally different from the noisy and busy roads of Cotonou

title: Super
text: Leur repas √©tait vraiment consistant, bel endroit. On y acc√®de par l‚Äôeau dans un bateau √† moteur . Exp√©rience incroyable
translated_text: Leur repas √©tait vraiment consistant, bel endroit. On y acc√®de par l‚Äôeau dans un bateau √† moteur . Exp√©rience incroyable

title: So lovely and easy to get to
text:
Arrival: We were surprised by how quick and easy it was to get to Bab‚Äôs Dock. Drive out the beach road until the pavement ends, continue a short way on the dirt road, and follow the signs. There‚Äôs plenty of parking near the boat launch. Adult-sized life jackets are available. The 10 minute boat ride through the mangroves is great. We saw a number of malachite kingfishers. It is also possible to drive around the lagoon and arrive without a boat ride, but we didn‚Äôt test that route.  

Activities: We saw people swimming in the (very shallow and relatively clean) lagoon, kayaking, and stand-up paddle boarding. There are also small sailboats to rent. Staff were open to arranging other (paid) activities, including sailing lessons, fishing, and birding. 
‚Ä®Restaurant: Nice outdoor ambiance. I enjoyed the BBQ chicken. Fresh juices and cocktails seem to be a highlight. Not a mosquito in sight when we were there. 

Kids: The kids played on the climbing equipment, fed the donkeys, and threw a lot of rocks into the water. The set up does require some supervision - the play spaces are not enclosed, so kids can wander over to the water. I would have preferred not to see monkeys and crocodiles in cages, both for the animals‚Äô sake and the fear of little fingers going in between the bars and getting bitten.

translated_text:
Arrival: We were surprised by how quick and easy it was to get to Bab‚Äôs Dock. Drive out the beach road until the pavement ends, continue a short way on the dirt road, and follow the signs. There‚Äôs plenty of parking near the boat launch. Adult-sized life jackets are available. The 10 minute boat ride through the mangroves is great. We saw a number of malachite kingfishers. It is also possible to drive around the lagoon and arrive without a boat ride, but we didn‚Äôt test that route.  

Activities: We saw people swimming in the (very shallow and relatively clean) lagoon, kayaking, and stand-up paddle boarding. There are also small sailboats to rent. Staff were open to arranging other (paid) activities, including sailing lessons, fishing, and birding. 
‚Ä®Restaurant: Nice outdoor ambiance. I enjoyed the BBQ chicken. Fresh juices and cocktails seem to be a highlight. Not a mosquito in sight when we were there. 

Kids: The kids played on the climbing equipment, fed the donkeys, and threw a lot of rocks into the water. The set up does require some supervision - the play spaces are not enclosed, so kids can wander over to the water. I would have preferred not to see monkeys and crocodiles in cages, both for the animals‚Äô sake and the fear of little fingers going in between the bars and getting bitten.

title: Une parenth√®se enchant√©e
text: Avons pass√© le r√©veillon et nouvel an au Bab‚Äôs Dock, ce lieu est magique, le bateau √† travers la mangrove pour y acc√©der f√©erique, perdu au bord du lac en pleine nature, habitat ecolo et am√©nagements pens√©s pour prot√©ger la nature, service top parfait, plats d√©licieux. A ne pas manquer lors d‚Äôun passage dans le sud du B√©nin.
translated_text: We spent New Year's Eve and New Year's at Bab's Dock. This place is magical. The boat ride through the mangroves to get there is magical. Lost on the edge of the lake in the middle of nature, the eco-friendly habitat and facilities designed to protect nature, the service is top-notch, and the food is delicious. Not to be missed during a visit to southern Benin.

title: A faire √† proximit√© de Cotonou
text:
C'est un lieu coup√© du monde o√π l'on acc√®de par pirogue au milieu de la mangrove. D'un coup on sort sur un immense lac et au bout ce ponton avec les installations du restaurant et de l'h√¥tel. L'accueil est tr√®s sympathique. Les am√©nagements sont parfait avec des tables, des nattes pour se coucher et des hamacs. Le restaurant est correct et √† tr√®s bon rapport qualit√© prix. On se baigner en toute s√©curit√©. Le lieu est tr√®s adapt√© pour des enfants.
Bien se renseigner sur les jours et horaires d'ouverture avant.
translated_text: It's a place cut off from the world where you access by canoe in the middle of the mangrove. Suddenly you come out onto a huge lake and at the end this pontoon with the restaurant and hotel facilities. The welcome is very friendly. The facilities are perfect with tables, sleeping mats and hammocks. The restaurant is decent and very good value for money. You can swim in complete safety. The place is very suitable for children. Be sure to check the opening days and hours beforehand.

title: Eh bien on adore !
text: Dommage que j‚Äôen avais beaucoup trop entendu parler avant et mis la barre assez haute,je ne suis absolument pas d√©√ßu bin au contraire et j‚Äôy retournerai avec joie mais √† voire..
translated_text: Too bad I had heard too much about it before and set the bar quite high, I am absolutely not disappointed, quite the opposite, and I will happily return, but we'll see...

title: A beneficial hideaway in the mangrove
text:
A real quiet haven in the outskirts of Cotonou. The food is okay, the bissap and the pineapple juice delicious and the view over the Laguna delightful. Kayaks and catamaran are available for the sailors.
It's just a shame they are keeping animals in tiny cages (monkeys and crocodile).
translated_title: A beneficial hideaway in the mangrove
translated_text:
A real quiet haven in the outskirts of Cotonou. The food is okay, the bissap and the pineapple juice delicious and the view over the Laguna delightful. Kayaks and catamaran are available for the sailors.
It's just a shame they are keeping animals in tiny cages (monkeys and crocodile).

title: Topissime
text:
J'ai d√©couvert cet endroit par une invitation familiale. Quelle agr√©able surprise !
Un endroit magique !! Permet d'√©chapper √† la pollution et au bruit de Cotonou.
Bravo et merci !!!
translated_text: I discovered this place through a family invitation. What a pleasant surprise! A magical place!! Allows you to escape the pollution and noise of Cotonou. Bravo and thank you!!!

title: Relaxing day at Bab‚Äôs Dock
text: We left the car close to the river  and we took a boat along a mangrove forest. We arrived to Bab‚Äôs Dock on the other side of the river and we quickly order food. While waiting for the food we chilled out on the deck. The food was correct. Overall we spent a nice time there and the kids really like the trip.
translated_text: We left the car close to the river  and we took a boat along a mangrove forest. We arrived to Bab‚Äôs Dock on the other side of the river and we quickly order food. While waiting for the food we chilled out on the deck. The food was correct. Overall we spent a nice time there and the kids really like the trip.

title: Beautiful location
text:
Awesome food with a beautiful lake and the mini zoo.
I enjoyed every bit I took and the boat ride on the lake is everything.
I will definitely be back.
translated_text:
Awesome food with a beautiful lake and the mini zoo.
I enjoyed every bit I took and the boat ride on the lake is everything.
I will definitely be back.

title: Bon repas
text: Les repas sont corrects mais l‚Äôendroit se fait vieux. Je pense qu‚Äôune petite r√©novation serait la bienvenue.
translated_text: The food is decent, but the place is getting old. I think a little renovation would be welcome.

title: D√©paysement garenti √† quelques encablures de Cotonou
text: Tr√®s agr√©able pour s'√©vader apr√®s un tr√®s sympathique sas dans la mangrove et jouer au Robinson sous les fredaisons de la lagune, devant une assiette tr√®s copieuse.Destination qui vaut son prix.
translated_title: A change of scenery guaranteed just a stone's throw from Cotonou
translated_text: Very pleasant to escape after a very pleasant airlock in the mangrove and play Robinson Crusoe under the hum of the lagoon, in front of a very generous plate. A destination that is worth its price.

title: Bien mais...
text:
Joli lieu, agr√©able. 
Repas simple et bon.
Rien √† dire sur l'accueil, par contre je ne comprends pas l'int√©r√™t d'avoir ces 3 pauvres singes enferm√©s dans de petites cages, ce crocodile dans un bassin aussi petit qu'une baignoire, ces √¢nes parqu√©s avec les enfants hurlant autour d'eux sans pouvoir se cacher...  Et les tortues idem. 
√áa a cass√© toute la magie du site. √ätre ecolo c'est bien mais pas en maltraitant des animaux !
translated_text: Nice place, pleasant. Simple and good meal. Nothing to say about the welcome, on the other hand I don't understand the point of having these 3 poor monkeys locked in small cages, this crocodile in a pool as small as a bathtub, these donkeys penned up with children screaming around them without being able to hide... And the turtles ditto. It broke all the magic of the site. Being eco-friendly is good but not by mistreating animals!

title: A must visit when in Republic of Benin
text: Finding Bab's dock was quite a challenge but we were really glad when we finally did. Exciting activities - swimming, canoeing and sailing. Really good food as well - I had fish (well spiced) and chips.
translated_title: A must visit when in Republic of Benin
translated_text: Finding Bab's dock was quite a challenge but we were really glad when we finally did. Exciting activities - swimming, canoeing and sailing. Really good food as well - I had fish (well spiced) and chips.

title: Escapade m√©morable
text:
D√©paysement garanti en passant dans les mangovres en bateau moteur dot√© de gilet de secours.
L'√Æle est tout aussi sympathique: cuisine saine et tarif abordable. Service √† la taille. A recommander
translated_text: A change of scenery is guaranteed as you cruise through the mangroves in a motorboat equipped with a life jacket. The island is just as friendly: healthy cuisine and affordable prices. Service is on point. Highly recommended.

title: Eine Oase
text:
20 km ausserhalb Cotonous, mit bewachtem Parkplatz. Aus dem Auto geht es in das kleine Boot, und schon die 10 min√ºtige F√§hrt durch die Mangroven versetzt einen in eine andrer Welt.

Babs Dock selber ist ein Ausflugspunkt, mit Restaurant, direkt an der Lagune. Schwimmen, Paddeln, Segeln m√∂glich, die beiden letzteren k√∂nnen ausgeliehen werden. Das Essen ist einfach, aber gut und herzhaft (seafood!). Die lokale Bedienung ist sehr freundlich, der Manager, ein Belgier, ein wenig knorrige, aber korrekt. F√ºr Kinder gibt es Tiere im K√§fig (Affen, Esel), das Krokodil in der engen Ringe ist allerdings sehr traurig. Publikum zum Gl√ºck sehr gemischt, sowohl der lokale Mittelstand als auch Expads und √ñko-touristen. Empfehlenswert und nicht zu teuer.

20 km ausserhalb Cotonous, mit bewachtem Parkplatz. Aus dem Auto geht es in das kleine Boot, und schon die 10 min√ºtige F√§hrt durch die Mangroven versetzt einen in eine andrer Welt.

Babs Dock selber ist ein Ausflugspunkt, mit Restaurant, direkt an der Lagune. Schwimmen, Paddeln, Segeln m√∂glich, die beiden letzteren k√∂nnen ausgeliehen werden. title: Endroit sympa sur la‚Äô lagune
text: Lieu atypique tr√®s agr√©able pour passer un dimanche en famille. On y acc√®de en bateau. Le lieu est conserv√© et ecolo ce qui le rend encore plus int√©ressant. La nourriture est simple mais le but est avant tout d y aller pour se d√©tendre. Les enfants peuvent faire un peu de bateau avec des‚Äômoniteurs tr√®s sympas. Je recommande cet endroit. Pour info il est √©galement possible d y passer la nuit. De jolies chambres pourvues de salles d eau avec toilettes s√®ches sont disponibles.
translated_text: A very pleasant, unusual place to spend a Sunday with the family. It is accessed by boat. The place is preserved and eco-friendly, which makes it even more interesting. The food is simple, but the main goal is to go there to relax. Children can go boating with very friendly instructors. I recommend this place. For your information, it is also possible to spend the night there. Lovely rooms with bathrooms and dry toilets are available.

title: Un lieu de d√©tente id√©al. Plus une plage sur la lagune qu'un restaurant
text:
D√©tente, relax, destress mais pas de vraie restauration. Quelques singes ou crocodiles, catamaran et pirogues.
Restauration tr√®s simple : poulet roti ou bar brais√© avec frites, alokos, salade ou riz
Bar complet

Acc√®s original en canot √† moteur en traversant la mangrove
translated_title: An ideal place to relax. More of a lagoon beach than a restaurant.
translated_text: Relaxation, relaxation, de-stressing but no real food. A few monkeys or crocodiles, catamaran and pirogues. Very simple food: roast chicken or braised sea bass with fries, alokos, salad or rice Full bar Original access by motorboat crossing the mangrove

title: A break away from the city
text: Takes time to get there but lovely beach road and boat ride is beautiful through the forest onto the lake.  the fresh fish skewers was beautifully cooked and the service was great.  There were some water sports options and take your swimsuit as you can swim in the lake.  Not much else to do here though so take it as a time to relax away from the city.
translated_title: A break away from the city
translated_text: Takes time to get there but lovely beach road and boat ride is beautiful through the forest onto the lake.  the fresh fish skewers was beautifully cooked and the service was great.  There were some water sports options and take your swimsuit as you can swim in the lake.  Not much else to do here though so take it as a time to relax away from the city.

title: Un endroit mythique de COTONOU
text:
L‚Äô√©tablissement se situe sur la Route des peches entre COTONOU et Ouidah 
On y acc√®de via un petit embarcad√®re ou une pirogue vous y am√®ne √† travers les mangroves 
G√©nial comme premier contact !
Le propri√©taire a am√©nag√© le lopin de terre en y installant un bar et un petit restaurant √† l‚Äôombre, tout √ßa sur pilotis.
On peut se baigner, faire du bateau, et c‚Äôest l‚Äôendroit r√™v√© pour passer du temps en famille, les enfants seront au paradis!
translated_text: The establishment is located on the Fishing Route between COTONOU and Ouidah. Access is via a small pier or a pirogue that takes you there through the mangroves. Great as a first contact! The owner has developed the plot of land by installing a bar and a small restaurant in the shade, all on stilts. You can swim, go boating, and it's the perfect place to spend time with the family, the children will be in heaven!

title: Beautiful European styled restaurant
text:
Bab‚Äôs Dock is a beautiful European styled restaurant tucked away at the edge of the lagoon in Cococodji (11km from Cotonou). 

Almost everything at this charming lake house is made of local wood.

The property can be accessed either by road or by boat which takes guests through the thick mangrove, with an access fee of CFA2500 per person. 

The food is great and the ambience amazing.

It is ideal for both children and adults.
translated_text:
Bab‚Äôs Dock is a beautiful European styled restaurant tucked away at the edge of the lagoon in Cococodji (11km from Cotonou). 

Almost everything at this charming lake house is made of local wood.

The property can be accessed either by road or by boat which takes guests through the thick mangrove, with an access fee of CFA2500 per person. 

The food is great and the ambience amazing.

It is ideal for both children and adults.

title: Nice place to chill but overpriced and bad customer Service
text: Went here on a weekend to get a few drinks and enjoy the bay. The location listed on Trip Advisor is misleading as it is about 30 minutes (by road) away from Cocodji. The townspeople in Cocodji had never heard of Bab's Dock so we had to stop at a random hotel to get Wifi and grab their number on their website to call them. When we eventually got there; they charged an Entrance fee of 2000 fcfa- this is aside from getting anything from their expensive menu. The Manager, Madame Dominique was a bit rude when we challenged the Entrance Fee- she cited that the fee covers a boat ride (which we weren't interested in taking) and use of the facilities. To avoid a scene, we had to take a boat ride to justify us spending so much. All in all, nice place to chill and enjoy the scene but please review your Entrance Fee policy and Customer Service.

The Manager, Madame Dominique was a bit rude when we challenged the Entrance Fee- she cited that the fee covers a boat ride (which we weren't interested in taking) and use of the facilities. To avoid a scene, we had to take a boat ride to justify us spending so much. All in all, nice place to chill and enjoy the scene but please review your Entrance Fee policy and Customer Service.

title: Sympa sans plus
text: La balade en bateau √† travers les mangroves est chouette mais on s'attendait √† un peu plus de place pour se poser au soleil. C'est seulement une grande terrasse ou on est vite les uns sur les autres. Les prix sont √©lev√©s mais c'est agr√©able pour sortir de l'enfer de Cotonou. Gros point n√©gatif : des singes en cage tr√®s malheureux et un crocodile en cage en encore pire √©tat... Aucun int√©r√™t d'avoir mis √ßa.
translated_text: The boat ride through the mangroves is nice, but we expected a little more space to sit in the sun. It's just a large terrace where we quickly find ourselves on top of each other. The prices are high, but it's a nice escape from the hell of Cotonou. Big negative: very unhappy caged monkeys and a caged crocodile in even worse condition... No point in having put that there.

title: Hidden surprise near Cotonou
text:
Great and very exotic place to visit in Cotonou. Ideal to relax and have a good very fresh fish food. The prices are a little bit high compared to the country but very moderate for a tourist (I doubt Benin will have a lot unfortunately). The scenery is great and well preserved. 
The obly two things that were negative are the animals in cage (monkey and croco) and the toilette s√®che. Very environmentally friendly concep but not very adequate.
translated_text:
Great and very exotic place to visit in Cotonou. Ideal to relax and have a good very fresh fish food. The prices are a little bit high compared to the country but very moderate for a tourist (I doubt Benin will have a lot unfortunately). The scenery is great and well preserved. 
The obly two things that were negative are the animals in cage (monkey and croco) and the toilette s√®che. Very environmentally friendly concep but not very adequate.

title: Adventerous way to get there, relaxing place
text: Just the way tog et there from Cotonou is really unique. Follow the beach road (sandy, bumpy, for 4W drives), beautiful beaches, palm trees, beautiful landscape. Take a boat through the mangrove forrest to get to Bab's dock which lays in a lagoon. It's a quiet and relaxing place, food is ok, staff is friendly. Some animals to see at the compund (alligator, monkeys, donkeys, turtles).
translated_title: Adventerous way to get there, relaxing place
translated_text: Just the way tog et there from Cotonou is really unique. Follow the beach road (sandy, bumpy, for 4W drives), beautiful beaches, palm trees, beautiful landscape. Take a boat through the mangrove forrest to get to Bab's dock which lays in a lagoon. It's a quiet and relaxing place, food is ok, staff is friendly. Some animals to see at the compund (alligator, monkeys, donkeys, turtles).

title: Suitable for picnics with family and friends
text:
Very good destination for a day with family and / or friends. Artificial island but very natural vegetation and warm frame. I always enjoyed going there. Attractions for children and adults, respecting the environment. Meals and beverages on-site. 
It is a detour that deserves to be done.
translated_title: Suitable for picnics with family and friends
translated_text:
Very good destination for a day with family and / or friends. Artificial island but very natural vegetation and warm frame. I always enjoyed going there. Attractions for children and adults, respecting the environment. Meals and beverages on-site. 
It is a detour that deserves to be done.

title: Relaxant parfait pour sortir de la ville un peu.
text: Beaucoup aim√©. Pour se rendre on doit prendre un petit b√¢teau. C√©tait pour passer la journ√©e , prendre du soleil, me baigner dans le lac et manger.  La nourriture √©tait bonne et le vin aussi. La baignade a fait du bien. Le lac n'est pas profond. On touche au fond du bout des pieds. Lieu bien am√©nag√© et vraiment relaxant. √Ä ne pas manquer.
translated_title: Perfect relaxing getaway for a bit of a getaway from the city.
translated_text: Loved it. To get there you have to take a small boat. It was to spend the day, sunbathe, swim in the lake and eat. The food was good and the wine too. Swimming was good. The lake is not deep. You can touch the bottom with your toes. Well-appointed and truly relaxing place. Not to be missed.

title: Un petit paradis
text:
Un passage obligatoire chez Mr Thierry 
Une bonne b√©ninoise au bord de la mangrove un tr√®s bonne  √©tablissement une cuisine g√©n√©reuse 
Que du bonheur
translated_text: A must-visit at Mr Thierry's A good Beninese woman on the edge of the mangrove, a very good establishment, generous cuisine, pure happiness

title: Calme et tranquillit√©
text:
Visite en famille √† 5. Nous avions quelques doutes en regardant les commentaires en particulier sur le manque ou la lenteur d'un service.  Est-ce parce que nous sommes arriv√©s t√¥t, avant midi ?  En tout cas, nous n'avons pas √©t√© d√©√ßus.  Fumer un bon cigare dans ce havre de paix, c'est bon !
Et la petite balade en barque sur les canaux apporte un peu d'exotisme aussi.
translated_text: Family visit of 5. We had some doubts when looking at the comments, especially about the lack or slowness of service. Is it because we arrived early, before noon? In any case, we were not disappointed. Smoking a good cigar in this haven of peace is good! And the little boat trip on the canals brings a bit of exoticism too.

title: oasis away from the city
text: After a gentle boat trip, we had lunch here and chilled for a few hours, very nice. It was part of a guided tour to Ganvie (the floating village) again by boat.
translated_text: After a gentle boat trip, we had lunch here and chilled for a few hours, very nice. It was part of a guided tour to Ganvie (the floating village) again by boat.

title: Agr√©able mais rien d'exceptionnel
text: Si on a l'habitude de Cotonou et de son absence de qui√©tude d√®s qu'on est sur la place plublique, cet endroit est un havre de paix. Il est √† recommander pour les familles avec des petits enfants. Pour des sorties entre amis, c'est agr√©able, notamment la travers√©e, mais rien de plus. Attention, les prix op√©r√©s ne sont pas pour toutes les bourses.
translated_text: If you're used to Cotonou and its lack of peace and quiet as soon as you're in the public square, this place is a haven of peace. It's recommended for families with small children. For outings with friends, it's pleasant, especially the crossing, but nothing more. Be careful, the prices are not for all budgets.

title: Coin de paradis !
text: Si vous voulez go√ªter au paradis... si vous voulez voir un paysage de r√™ve ... Bab's dock est un des endroits incontournables du B√©nin ! Magnifique petit restaurant, au bord d'une lagune... acc√®s par bateau en passant dans une petite jungle de mangrove. Parfait pour passer du temps en famille,  faire du kayak et de la voile ou profiter du beau temps en sirotant un cocktail au soleil.
translated_text: If you want to taste paradise... if you want to see a dream landscape... Bab's Dock is one of the must-see places in Benin! Beautiful little restaurant, on the edge of a lagoon... access by boat passing through a small mangrove jungle. Perfect for spending time with family, kayaking and sailing or enjoying the beautiful weather while sipping a cocktail in the sun.

title: d√©couverte hors du temps
text: Superbe endroit pour d√©tente et repos. En dehors de la ville. UN bateau vous m√®ne au milieu de nul part. Endroit magnifique.
translated_text: A great place to relax and unwind. Outside the city. A boat takes you to the middle of nowhere. Beautiful place.

title: Que le cadre
text:
Superbe arriv√©e en bateaux en traversant la mangrove. La vue est magnifique le cadre est reposant. Le site vaut le d√©tour. 
Service inexistant et incomp√©tent. Carte sans int√©r√™t cuisine quelconque . Temps de attente long m√™me pour l addition.
Y aller que pour le site et y prendre un verre si il ne manque rien.
translated_text: Superb arrival by boat crossing the mangrove. The view is magnificent, the setting is relaxing. The site is worth the detour. Non-existent and incompetent service. Uninteresting menu, average cuisine. Long waiting times even for the bill. Go there only for the site and have a drink if nothing is missing.

title: Glorious and peaceful day out
text:
Great food in a relaxing atmosphere. The prices are no higher than central Cotonou but the adventure of getting to the dock down the mostly unmade roads (Land Rover or high axle vehicle would have been much easier) then the boat through the mangroves and the lagoon is worth it.
The lagoon is safe to wade in (enough salt to prevent schistosomiasis evidently) and the fresh fish is very fresh indeed.
only open weekends but prepared to open midweek if a big enough party prebook.
Quiet and relaxing even when full.
translated_text:
Great food in a relaxing atmosphere. The prices are no higher than central Cotonou but the adventure of getting to the dock down the mostly unmade roads (Land Rover or high axle vehicle would have been much easier) then the boat through the mangroves and the lagoon is worth it.
The lagoon is safe to wade in (enough salt to prevent schistosomiasis evidently) and the fresh fish is very fresh indeed.
only open weekends but prepared to open midweek if a big enough party prebook.
Quiet and relaxing even when full.

title: Great Getaway
text: What I hatttttte about Bab's Dock is that he has trapped an alligator in an enclosed cement pit with no nature at all. Not only no nature, but it's disgustingly filthy. This poor being is imprisoned for the sake of people being able to "view" it like it's a circus attraction, when in reality, it's ANIMAL ABUSE. Get rid of the alligator, set it FREE. The area can easily withstand a creature in the wild as it would be so shell-shocked by this point it would simply be happy to be released back into nature. And trust me, it won't go near another stupid human for the rest of it's life. Animal cruelty is NEVER ok.
translated_text: What I hatttttte about Bab's Dock is that he has trapped an alligator in an enclosed cement pit with no nature at all. Not only no nature, but it's disgustingly filthy. This poor being is imprisoned for the sake of people being able to "view" it like it's a circus attraction, when in reality, it's ANIMAL ABUSE. Get rid of the alligator, set it FREE. The area can easily withstand a creature in the wild as it would be so shell-shocked by this point it would simply be happy to be released back into nature. And trust me, it won't go near another stupid human for the rest of it's life. Animal cruelty is NEVER ok.

title: Tr√®s agr√©able.
text: Tr√®s int√©ressant site. Apr√®s un court trajet en bateau on y arrive. D√âPAYSEMENT total et Service agr√©able. Super pour se d√©tendre pr√®s de l'eau avec un bouquin et une part de tarte √† la mangue
translated_text: Very interesting site. After a short boat ride you arrive there. Total change of scenery and pleasant service. Great for relaxing by the water with a book and a slice of mango pie.

title: Hors des sentiers battus
text:
Endroit qui sort de l'ordinaire.
Mais que font ces pauvres singes en cage?????
Nourriture de bonne qualite, prix corrects
Le seul hic c'est le prix de la traversee en bateau qui est exagere.
Je prefere y aller par la route mais la encore il faut payer. Je ne trouve pas ca normal.
L'essence c'est moi qui la paye et non l'etablissement.
translated_text: An unusual place. What are these poor monkeys doing in cages????? Good quality food, reasonable prices. The only problem is the price of the boat crossing, which is exorbitant. I prefer to go by road, but even then you have to pay. I don't think that's normal. I pay for the gas, not the establishment.

title: Original et super avec de jeunes enfants
text: L'acc√©s est plus que sympathique : il se fait en bateau, sous les pal√©tuviers, √† travers la lagune. Une fois d√©barqu√© il faut s'installer sous les cocotiers c√¥t√© est ou choisir le deck. Nourriture simple mais bonne. Service excellent. Mini zoo pour les enfants (crocodile, singe, anes et tortues) Baignade (eau peu profonde pour les enfants) mini voilier, pirogues
translated_title: Original and great with young children
translated_text: Access is more than pleasant: it is done by boat, under the mangroves, across the lagoon. Once disembarked, you have to settle under the coconut trees on the east side or choose the deck. Simple but good food. Excellent service. Mini zoo for children (crocodile, monkey, donkeys and turtles). Swimming (shallow water for children), mini sailboat, canoes.

title: Magnifique
text: On √† pass√© un dimanche apr√®s midi .c'est tr√®s reposant,il faut prendre un il faut prendre un petit bateau pour aller √† l'autre c√¥t√©
translated_text: We spent a Sunday afternoon there. It was very relaxing. You have to take a small boat to go to the other side.

title: Super endroit
text:
A faire absolument si vous avez quelques jours dans le coin.
Peu de gens le font mais il faut y rester la nuit : il n'y aura personne d'autre que vous.
Le personnel est efficace, le directeur est tr√®s sympa. On y mange bien.
Les tarifs sont plus √©lev√©s qu'ailleurs mais cela vaut vraiment le coup.
A faire et √† refaire.
translated_text: A must-do if you have a few days in the area. Few people do it, but you have to stay the night: there will be no one else there but you. The staff is efficient, the manager is very friendly. The food is good. The prices are higher than elsewhere, but it's definitely worth it. A must-do.

title: Hummmm
text:
Le bab'dock est l'un des plus beaux lieux de plaisance √† Cotonou. Apr√®s une vir√©e en voiture ou √† moto, on y acc√®de par barque motoris√©e. C'est tr√®s agr√©able.  Il s'y trouve un mini zoo avec des singes,  des √¢nes,....  il y a un bar, des transats pour se reposer. il y a un espace de jeux et les toilettes sont √©cologiques. Bref, un vrai lieu de plaisance au bord du lac. 

Les enfants jouent dans le lac ou √† proximit√©.  C'est plut√¥t s√©curisant et distrayant.
translated_text: The Bab'dock is one of the most beautiful recreational areas in Cotonou. After a car or motorbike ride, you can get there by motorized boat. It's very pleasant. There's a mini zoo with monkeys, donkeys, and more. There's a bar and deckchairs for relaxing. There's a play area, and the toilets are eco-friendly. In short, a real recreational area by the lake. Children play in or near the lake. It's quite safe and fun.

title: Un coin de paradis
text:
Un endroit cach√© dans lequel on peut vraiment se d√©tendre...
Un vrai bonheur .
J y retourne d√®s mon prochain voyage √† cotonou!!!
translated_text: A hidden place where you can really relax... A real pleasure. I'll go back there on my next trip to Cotonou!!!

title: Trop de contrastes
text:
C'est un endroit magnifique ,ressour√ßant et apaisant cependant j'ai not√© lors de mes visites des contrastes qui malheureusement ternissent un peut l'image de ce lieu.
En effet d'un c√¥t√© nous avont un lieu unique en son genre qui nous donne un paysage magnifique et la balade en bateaux pour y acc√©der est vraiment superbe;  le personnel est sympathique et la nourriture est satisfaisant de plus les propri√©taires on d√©cidaient d'utiliser des toilettes s√®ches et je trouve cette id√©e vraiment bien ( aspects √©cologique)  mais en opposition le bateau qui nous m√®ne sur l'√Æle est √† moteur et vus le nombreux d'aller et retour qu'il fait par jour je ne pense pas que ce soit la meilleure chose pour l'environnement  ( une balade en pirogue plairait tout autant au visiteurs) mais bon ce n'est qu'un d√©tail. La chose qui a mis de l'ombre dans ce d√©cor magnifique ce son les animaux,  en effet les propri√©taires on d√©cidaient d'avoir des animaux,  en sois cela est une bonne id√©e c'est exotiques et √ßa apporte un vrai plus au Bab's Dock toute foie ils y a 3 seinges dans des cages minuscules et de ce fait ils en son violent. Cela fait vraiment de la paine de voire de si beau animaux enferm√© de la sorte et cest aussi le cas pour un crocodile qui me semble bien trop gros pour son habitat et enfin il y a des √¢nes qui semble plus maigres que la premi√®re fois ou je l'ai est vu malgr√© beaucoup de nourriture dans leur enclos. 
Finalement je dirais que le Bab's Dock est un lieu super et qui vos vraiment  le d√©tour cependant il y a un c√¥t√© sombre qui terni son image.  En esp√©rant voire des am√©liorations concernant les animaux et le lieu en deviendrait parfait.
translated_text: It is a magnificent place, rejuvenating and soothing, however I noticed during my visits contrasts which unfortunately tarnish the image of this place a little. Indeed on one hand we have a unique place of its kind which gives us a magnificent landscape and the boat ride to get there is really superb; the staff is friendly and the food is satisfactory moreover the owners decided to use dry toilets and I find this idea really good (ecological aspects) but in opposition the boat which takes us to the island is motorized and given the many round trips it makes per day I do not think that it is the best thing for the environment (a canoe ride would please visitors just as much) but hey it is only a detail. The thing that put a shadow in this magnificent setting are the animals, in fact the owners decided to have animals, in itself this is a good idea it is exotic and it brings a real plus to Bab's Dock all the time there are 3 monkeys in tiny cages and therefore they are violent. It is really painful to see such beautiful animals locked up like this and this is also the case for a crocodile which seems to me much too big for its habitat and finally there are donkeys which seem thinner than the first time I saw it despite a lot of food in their enclosure. Finally I would say that Bab's Dock is a great place and which you are really worth the detour however there is a dark side which tarnishes its image. Hoping to see improvements concerning the animals and the place would become perfect.

title: Cool place to relax!
text: Cool place to just get away from hectic Cotonou! It's about 45 minut drive from Cotonou and the road by the sea is pretty cool to see when you go there! The mangrove on the way to Bab's dock is also very beautiful! Once you're there, just enjoy, sit back and relax with a beer or some food. If it gets too hot, take a little dip in the lake!
translated_text: Cool place to just get away from hectic Cotonou! It's about 45 minut drive from Cotonou and the road by the sea is pretty cool to see when you go there! The mangrove on the way to Bab's dock is also very beautiful! Once you're there, just enjoy, sit back and relax with a beer or some food. If it gets too hot, take a little dip in the lake!

title: Good for a lazy day
text:
I think it is open only at weekends. 13km from Cotonou but accessible only by boat provided by Babs Dock (about 3 euro per person). The boat goes through a tunnel of mangroves and across a shallow lagoon. You can swim but it is murky. There is an ancient partly rigged Laser dinghy, an ancient windsurfer and some canoes. Run by a European, it offers great food, the best giant prawns (gambas) I have had, a meal and drinks for about 20 euro. Frozen tiramisu was nice. Nespresso coffee. 
There are some caged monkeys and some donkeys for amusing children but little else. A beach area for soaking up the sun.
translated_text:
I think it is open only at weekends. 13km from Cotonou but accessible only by boat provided by Babs Dock (about 3 euro per person). The boat goes through a tunnel of mangroves and across a shallow lagoon. You can swim but it is murky. There is an ancient partly rigged Laser dinghy, an ancient windsurfer and some canoes. Run by a European, it offers great food, the best giant prawns (gambas) I have had, a meal and drinks for about 20 euro. Frozen tiramisu was nice. Nespresso coffee. 
There are some caged monkeys and some donkeys for amusing children but little else. A beach area for soaking up the sun.

title: parfait
text:
un endroit unique, une petite √Æle qu'on ne peut atteindre qu'en b√¢teau. L'ile est magnifique. Les enfants peuvent jouer en toute libert√© (cano√©, animaux....)
un super endroit √† conseiller
translated_text: A unique place, a small island that can only be reached by boat. The island is magnificent. Children can play freely (canoeing, animals, etc.) A great place to recommend

title: Parfait
text: Si vous passez par Cotonou c'est l'endroit qu'il ne faut pas manquer.. A environ 10 km de Fidjerosse on prend la route de la plage pour arriver √† un endroit magnifique. Attention, la route n'est pas dans un tr√®s bon √©tat, donc il faut compter au moins 30 min pour y arriver. Les autres avis d√©crivent tr√®s bien le lieux, donc je ne vais me lancer la dedans, juste pr√©ciser que l'acceuil est au top, le poisson brais√© est le meilleur que j'ai mang√© pendant mon s√©jour de 2 semaines. Le lieu est magique avec des animaux, des activit√©s, la baignade et c'est parfait pour passer son dimanche..
translated_text: If you pass through Cotonou this is the place you should not miss. About 10 km from Fidjerosse, take the beach road to arrive at a magnificent place. Be careful, the road is not in very good condition, so it takes at least 30 minutes to get there. The other reviews describe the place very well, so I'm not going to go into that, just to say that the welcome is top notch, the grilled fish is the best I ate during my 2-week stay. The place is magical with animals, activities, swimming and it's perfect for spending your Sunday.

title: Disappointed
text: I was there on a Tuesday but they don't work except weekends and the place wasn't as described. Anyone who wants to visit must go there on weekends. Won't recommend to anyone either
translated_text: I was there on a Tuesday but they don't work except weekends and the place wasn't as described. Anyone who wants to visit must go there on weekends. Won't recommend to anyone either

title: Endroit magique
text:
Vraiment super! Petit √Ælot que l'on rejoint gr√¢ce √† une pirogue qui traverse une mangrove! Paysage magique, d√©j√† dans le trajet on en a pleins les yeux.
Sur place on peut se baigner, bronzer sur les matelas, se rassasier et boire un verre. Il y a un mini zoo avec des singes etc...
Les enfants peuvent profiter de balan√ßoires.
C'est un endroit vraiment agr√©able o√π l'on peut passer la journ√©e et m√™me rester la nuit ( avec r√©servation).
A voir absolument!
translated_text: Really great! Small island that you reach thanks to a canoe that crosses a mangrove! Magical landscape, already on the journey we are amazed. There you can swim, sunbathe on the mattresses, eat and have a drink. There is a mini zoo with monkeys etc... Children can enjoy swings. It is a really nice place where you can spend the day and even stay the night (with reservation). A must see!

title: G√ºzel
text: Eƒüer hafta sonu kafa dinlemek i√ßin bir yer arƒ±yorsanƒ±z burasƒ± √ßok iyi manzara s√ºper merkeze biraz uzak ama g√∂r√ºlmeye deƒüer bir yer .........
translated_text: Now it's the end of the day and it's the end of the world....

title: Small paradise
text: This place remains one of our prefered outings from Cotonou. The small tour through the mangrove tunnel is a wonderful start of the experience. The lush vegetation of the restaurant itself provides a magnificent decor. The food is nice, without being exquisite. This time we had some delicious grilled gamba's with frites and .....mayonaise, after all the owner is from Belgium.
translated_text: This place remains one of our prefered outings from Cotonou. The small tour through the mangrove tunnel is a wonderful start of the experience. The lush vegetation of the restaurant itself provides a magnificent decor. The food is nice, without being exquisite. This time we had some delicious grilled gamba's with frites and .....mayonaise, after all the owner is from Belgium.

title: tres sympa,agreable et unique
text: Lieu tr√®s agr√©able ,sympa et unique au Benin .Possibilit√© de recr√©ation aquatique .Id√©al pour passer un bon temps un peu en dehors de Cotonou .
translated_text: Very pleasant, friendly and unique place in Benin. Possibility of aquatic recreation. Ideal for spending a good time a little outside of Cotonou.

title: Fabuleux
text:
D√©couvert gr√¢ce √† notre taxi.
Un nature g√©n√©reuse, le calme et le d√©paysement. 
Un endroit extraordinaire g√©r√© par une √©quip√© agr√©able et sympathique.
Un patron belge tr√®s accueillant et fort aimable.
Cuisine de grillades qui va tr√®s bien avec le lieu.
Si j'ai le temps j'y reviendrais avec plaisir.
Ne ratez pas cet endroit si vous √™tes √† Cotonou.
translated_text: Discovered by taxi. A bountiful natural setting, calm, and a change of scenery. An extraordinary place run by a pleasant and friendly team. A very welcoming and kind Belgian owner. Grilled cuisine that goes very well with the location. If I have time, I would happily return. Don't miss this place if you are in Cotonou.

title: Heaven exits
text:
After five years driving down the Route de Peche towards Ouidah I visited Bab's Dock again.
From the boat's departure via the mangrove to Bab's Dock is already an exerience by itself.
The warm welcome by Thierry, great food and drinks and the ambiance is just great.
You want to sit back and relax, sail, swim, kayak....it is all there.
Still a wonderful place that deserves to be no. 1
translated_text:
After five years driving down the Route de Peche towards Ouidah I visited Bab's Dock again.
From the boat's departure via the mangrove to Bab's Dock is already an exerience by itself.
The warm welcome by Thierry, great food and drinks and the ambiance is just great.
You want to sit back and relax, sail, swim, kayak....it is all there.
Still a wonderful place that deserves to be no. 1

title: Tr√©s beau site!!!!
text:
Trouv√© via Tripadvisor, nous √©tions ravi avec ma petite famille du lieu : animaux, jeux pour enfant, bar et restauration, plage
A refaire quand on repassera √† Cotonou!!!!
translated_text:
Trouv√© via Tripadvisor, nous √©tions ravi avec ma petite famille du lieu : animaux, jeux pour enfant, bar et restauration, plage
A refaire quand on repassera √† Cotonou!!!!

title: Paradiso!!
text: 5 minuti in barca attraverso le mangrovie e poi resterete senza parole!!! Una vera oasi di relax e pace!! Ho assisitito ad un magnifico tramonto! Posto favoloso!!
translated_text: 5 minutes in the boat across the mangrove and you can stay on track!!! A true oasis of relaxation and peace!! Ho assist a magnificent tramonto! Fabulous post!!

title: Evadez vous !
text:
C'est l'endroit par excellence qui vous d√©tendra aux environs de Cotonou.
Derri√®re la mangrove, vous acc√©derez sur le lieux gr√¢ce √† un bateau. N'h√©sitez pas depuis la route des p√™ches √† emprunter le chemin jusqu'au parking. 
Arriv√© sur place vous ne serez pas d√©√ßus ! Plusieurs coins sont disponibles pour s'y poser en famille ou entre amis. La cuisine est bonne et le rapport qualit√©/prix est acceptable. 
Les patrons sont d'une extr√™me convivialit√© envers tous leurs clients et vous accueillerons √† votre arriv√©e en bateau. 
Possibilit√© de faire de la voile ou du cano√´.
Parfait pour un week-end au calme.
translated_text: This is the perfect place to relax near Cotonou. Behind the mangroves, you can access the site by boat. Don't hesitate to take the path from the fishing road to the parking lot. Once there, you won't be disappointed! Several spots are available to relax with family or friends. The food is good and the price/quality ratio is acceptable. The owners are extremely friendly to all their customers and will welcome you upon your arrival by boat. Sailing or canoeing is available. Perfect for a quiet weekend.

title: Derri√®re les mangroves...
text: Superbe site de d√©tente √† quelques kilos de Cotonou. Accueil chaleureux sur le ponton. Petite plage, toilettes bio, jardin de jeux pour les petits... dans un cadre 'fait main par le proprio'. Si vous avez de la chance d'y loger... c'est le calme absolu le soir. Vaut le d√©tour...
translated_text: Superb relaxing spot just a few kilometers from Cotonou. Warm welcome on the pontoon. Small beach, organic toilets, playground for children... in a setting 'handmade by the owner'. If you're lucky enough to stay there... it's absolutely peaceful in the evening. Worth the detour...

title: Enjoyable day trip
text: Nice drive and boat ride out to Bab's Dock. Had a wonder full lunch and just had time to relax and reflect. Well worth the visit.
translated_text: Nice drive and boat ride out to Bab's Dock. Had a wonder full lunch and just had time to relax and reflect. Well worth the visit.

title: Amazing trip
text: Bab's dock is really a place to be. It's a place outside the regular beach outing. Seeing mangrove tree for the 1st time. I love the food. I ate sometin different too- rabbit.
translated_text: Bab's dock is really a place to be. It's a place outside the regular beach outing. Seeing mangrove tree for the 1st time. I love the food. I ate sometin different too- rabbit.

title: Lagoon in Mangrove forest
text: Traveling in Benin some locals took me to Bab Dock. The drive to get there along the beach from Cotonou was really nice and so was the lagoon itself. A little pricey if you are on a budget, but otherwise a good place to visit.
translated_text: Traveling in Benin some locals took me to Bab Dock. The drive to get there along the beach from Cotonou was really nice and so was the lagoon itself. A little pricey if you are on a budget, but otherwise a good place to visit.

title: un coin de paradis
text:
une cuisine raffin√©e 
un cadre paradisiaque
le tout dans une base de loisirs entretenue et confortable
√† recommander
translated_text: refined cuisine in a heavenly setting, all in a well-maintained and comfortable leisure center, highly recommended

title: Super coin d√©tente et p√™che
text:
Coin d√©tente tr√®s sympa. Les serveurs et les patrons sont tr√®s gentils et accueillant. On peut y faire de la voile ou du cano√´. J'y p√™che depuis 4ans ( 2010), on y trouve du silure africain, du tilapia, des scalaires(tr√®s rare) et des heterotis. Je vous conseille ce lieu en pleine nature. 
Arthur le p√™cheur
translated_text: Very nice relaxation area. The servers and owners are very kind and welcoming. You can go sailing or canoeing there. I have been fishing there for 4 years (2010), you can find African catfish, tilapia, angelfish (very rare) and heterotis. I recommend this place in the heart of nature. Arthur the fisherman

title: Super lieu de d√©tente pr√®s de Cotonou
text:
Un des plus bel endroit pour se d√©tendre pr√®s de Cotonou.
Ce petit havre de paix situ√© sur la lagune propose des activit√©s eco nautiques, de la restauration et des emplacements sur les pontons pour passer d'agr√©ables moments.
La balade en bateau √† travers la mangrove pour y acc√©der m'a beaucoup plus √©galement.
translated_title: Great place to relax near Cotonou
translated_text: One of the most beautiful places to relax near Cotonou. This little haven of peace located on the lagoon offers eco-nautical activities, restaurants, and pontoon spots for a pleasant stay. I also really enjoyed the boat ride through the mangroves to get there.

title: Un il√¥t de paradis au coeur de la lagune
text: Un cadre agr√©able avec des activit√©s nautiques vari√©es pour toute la famille ou entre amis agr√©ment√© d'un menu original rappelant les douceurs de la France. Une v√©ritable pause et un accueil tr√®s chaleureux de la part des ma√Ætre et ma√Ætresse des lieux, une client√®le cosmopolite, d√©paysement garanti et tr√®s diff√©rent des autres sites touristiques locaux, on n'imagine pas endroit nous attend lorsque nous prenons la pirogue....
translated_title: An island of paradise in the heart of the lagoon
translated_text: A pleasant setting with a variety of water activities for the whole family or friends, complemented by an original menu reminiscent of the delights of France. A real break and a very warm welcome from the master and mistress of the place, a cosmopolitan clientele, a guaranteed change of scenery and very different from other local tourist sites, we can't imagine the place awaits us when we take the pirogue....

title: Magique
text: Le trajet dans la mangrove est superbe. Un endroit paradisiaque et reposant, loin de l'agitation de Cotonou. A faire !
translated_text: The journey through the mangroves is superb. A heavenly and relaxing place, far from the hustle and bustle of Cotonou. A must-do!

text:

Les enfants aimeront les √¢nes

title: Exceptional Place in Cotonou
text: Fantastic place, the real visi√≥n of West Africa.  You take a boat in the middle of forest, then you go through a lake and you will see the Paradise, A restaurant  in an exceptional place
translated_text: Fantastic place, the real visi√≥n of West Africa.  You take a boat in the middle of forest, then you go through a lake and you will see the Paradise, A restaurant  in an exceptional place

title: Don't miss Bab's Dock....
text:
This place is owned by two amazing Belgians that built this paradise in the middle of nowhere...
A short magical boat-ride and you are there...
A great place to relax and kick back... Have a drink, sunbath, swim, eat something and just enjoy your time....
translated_text:
This place is owned by two amazing Belgians that built this paradise in the middle of nowhere...
A short magical boat-ride and you are there...
A great place to relax and kick back... Have a drink, sunbath, swim, eat something and just enjoy your time....

title: un go√ªt de paradis
text:
on y arrive en barque par un tunnel dans la mangrove...
un endroit tr√®s beau et un accueil chaleureux...
translated_text: We arrive there by boat through a tunnel in the mangrove... a very beautiful place and a warm welcome...

title: Small paradise
text: At about half an hour drive from Cotonou and a 10 minute boatride, this you arrive at an open air restaurant on th shore of the lagoon. Under big trees with lots of shadow you may enjoy a few hours of  rest in a splendid environment. The food is really ok, but not more than that. Plenty waiters and waitress, you don't wait long to be served. There training is however pretty basic. By the way only open on weekends and some holidays.
translated_text: At about half an hour drive from Cotonou and a 10 minute boatride, this you arrive at an open air restaurant on th shore of the lagoon. Under big trees with lots of shadow you may enjoy a few hours of  rest in a splendid environment. The food is really ok, but not more than that. Plenty waiters and waitress, you don't wait long to be served. There training is however pretty basic. By the way only open on weekends and some holidays.

title: paradis...
text:
Formidable, une presqu'√Æle entour√© d'eau. On peut faire du kayac, petit voilier, se baigner, bronzer sur le quai. La nourriture est excellente m√™me les singes et les √¢nes sont sympa...
Que dire de l'h√¥te et l'h√¥tesse??? l'accueil est sublime...
translated_text: Wonderful, a peninsula surrounded by water. You can go kayaking, sailboat, swim, sunbathe on the dock. The food is excellent, even the monkeys and donkeys are friendly... What can I say about the host and hostess??? The welcome is sublime...

title: Super endroit
text: Tr√®s bonne accueil dans cet endroit de r√™ve id√©al pour passer la journ√©e. Tarif et prestation tr√®s corrects.
translated_text: Very warm welcome in this dream location, ideal for spending the day. Very reasonable prices and service.

title: Magnifique endroit pour se ressourcer
text:
Avec quelques amis, nous avons quitt√© le tumulte de Cotonou le temps d'une journ√©e pour venir nous ressourcer. Nous avons laiss√© notre voiture sur le parking et un b√¢teau nous √† emmen√© √† travers la mangrove jusqu'√† Bab's dock. Cet endroit situ√© entre Cotonou et Ouidah est id√©al pour venir boire un verre avec des amis, √©couter de la musique et se d√©tendre.

Je conseille √† tout voyageur de passage √† Cotonou de visiter cet endroit !
translated_title: Magnificent place to recharge your batteries
translated_text: With a few friends, we left the hustle and bustle of Cotonou for a day to recharge our batteries. We left our car in the parking lot and a boat took us through the mangroves to Bab's Dock. This place, located between Cotonou and Ouidah, is ideal for having a drink with friends, listening to music, and relaxing. I recommend this place to any traveler passing through Cotonou!

title: Our favorite day trip
text: It is really our favorite place for a day trip. Wonderful short boat trip trough the mangrove. Then Just sitting on the dock, having a glass and relaxing, while the kids are either on the playground or in the water. The food is great as well. Then just a bit of exercise on the canoes or kayak there. Ideal way to spend quality time with the kids.
translated_text: It is really our favorite place for a day trip. Wonderful short boat trip trough the mangrove. Then Just sitting on the dock, having a glass and relaxing, while the kids are either on the playground or in the water. The food is great as well. Then just a bit of exercise on the canoes or kayak there. Ideal way to spend quality time with the kids.

title: Best place outside Cotonou
text: Bab's Dock is located outside Cotonou. Take the Route de Peche around 20 mins and don't miss the sign to go right just before Helvetica. Park your car and take the small boat that will ferry you through the mangrove and across the lake to Bab's Dock. Excellent start! This is a place to chill, listen music and have a drink. Food is not so much recommended. Quality is not that good and it is overprized. Still highly recommended!
translated_text: Bab's Dock is located outside Cotonou. Take the Route de Peche around 20 mins and don't miss the sign to go right just before Helvetica. Park your car and take the small boat that will ferry you through the mangrove and across the lake to Bab's Dock. Excellent start! This is a place to chill, listen music and have a drink. Food is not so much recommended. Quality is not that good and it is overprized. Still highly recommended!

title: un havre de paix
text:
Loin du tumulte et de la pollution de Cotonou, il fait bon de passer la journ√©e dans ce havre de paix.
C'est un couple de belges qui sont √† l‚Äôorigine de cette id√©e et tout est mis en ≈ìuvre pour que vous puissiez vous ressourcer.
Le cadre est vraiment tr√®s sympa, et on y acc√®de en pirogue, apr√®s avoir suivi un cours d'eau traversant la mangrove.
D√©j√† cette ballade en elle m√™me est tr√®s agr√©able.
Puis on arrive au ponton qui dessert cette ile ( ou plut√¥t presqu'ile... Mais tout est fait pour que vous vous sentiez sur une ile.)
Baignade, farniente,bar, restaurant, on profite de tout et on se d√©tend vraiment.

Pour vous y rendre, prenez la route des p√™ches et vous verrez un panneau sur votre droite. suivez le jusqu'√† l'embarcad√®re.
translated_text: Far from the hustle and bustle of Cotonou, it's good to spend the day in this haven of peace. It's a Belgian couple who came up with this idea and everything is done so that you can recharge your batteries. The setting is really very nice, and you get there by canoe, after following a waterway crossing the mangrove. This walk in itself is very pleasant. Then you arrive at the pontoon that serves this island (or rather peninsula... But everything is done to make you feel like you're on an island.) Swimming, relaxing, bar, restaurant, we take advantage of everything and really relax. To get there, take the fishing road and you will see a sign on your right. Follow it to the pier.
